thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 28 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Aconex Receives Foreign Investment Review Board Notification Regarding Oracle Corp Buying Co

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Aconex Receives Foreign Investment Review Board Notification Regarding Oracle Corp Buying Co

organizations.name: brief-aconex receives foreign investment review board notification regarding oracle corp buying co

text:
March 1 (Reuters) - Aconex Ltd:
* RECEIVES FOREIGN INVESTMENT REVIEW BOARD NOTIFICATION CONFIRMING AUSTRALIAN GOVERNMENT HAS NO OBJECTIONS TO ORACLE CORP BUYING CO
* “ALL RELEVANT GOVERNMENT AGENCIES HAVE NOW ALSO PROVIDED MERGER CLEARANCE IN RESPECT OF THE SCHEME”
* PROPOSED ACQUISITION OF CO BY ORACLE CORP TO BE EXECUTED VIA ORACLE CORP‘S UNIT, VANTIVE AUSTRALIA PTY Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
